scene_6.title: Word Avalanche
scene_6.description: Vocabulary words tumbling down like deadly avalanche, burying child
sequence: (0-1s) AVALANCHE of words crashes down, child buried under pile, arms reaching up
(1-2s) Parent RAPPELS down from above, phone extended like grappling hook
(2-3s) Phone screen fires TRACTOR BEAM upward, catches falling words
(3-4s) Words freeze mid-fall, hovering in beam like caught snowflakes
(4-5s) Phone rotates, beam spins words into alphabetical spiral formation
(5-6s) Words lock into place, forming perfect vocabulary list structure
(6-7s) Child climbs out of pile, words now organized ladder beside them
(7-8s) Both climb word ladder together, high-five at top
scene_6.phone_action: Tractor beam that catches and reorganizes falling chaos
scene_6.core_message: Buried by words → Phone catches them → Organized ladder up

scene_7.title: Time Bomb Deadline
scene_7.description: Giant ticking clock-bomb about to explode, child frozen in panic
sequence: (0-1s) MASSIVE CLOCK looming over child, ticking loud, numbers spinning wildly
(1-2s) Parent SLIDES under table, emerges behind child, phone armed
(2-3s) Phone shoots FREEZE RAY at clock, ice crystals spreading
(3-4s) Clock mechanism FREEZES, gears stop, ice coating everything
(4-5s) Parent taps frozen clock with phone, shatters into TIME FRAGMENTS
(5-6s) Fragments reorganize into neat schedule/planner on page
(6-7s) New clock appears, ticking calmly, child breathing easy
(7-8s) Parent sets phone down, pats child's shoulder, crisis averted
scene_7.phone_action: Freeze ray that stops time panic and creates calm order
scene_7.core_message: Time bomb pressure → Phone freezes it → Manageable schedule

scene_8.title: Question Mark Quicksand
scene_8.description: Child sinking into pit of swirling question marks, drowning in unknowns
sequence: (0-1s) Child waist-deep in ??? quicksand, sinking fast, arms flailing
(1-2s) Parent DIVES forward, extends phone like lifeline, determined face
(2-3s) Phone emits ROPE OF LIGHT, wraps around child's wrist
(3-4s) Parent YANKS light-rope, pulls child up, question marks clinging
(4-5s) Phone screen opens wide, INHALES all question marks like vacuum
(5-6s) Phone processes questions, spits out glowing ANSWER KEYS
(6-7s) Answer keys rain down gently, child catching them, smiling
(7-8s) Both standing firm on solid ground, questions conquered
scene_8.phone_action: Rescue rope that saves and transforms questions to answers
scene_8.core_message: Drowning in questions → Phone rescues → Answers flow

scene_9.title: Formula Dragon
scene_9.description: Math formula breathing fire dragon attacking child, equations blazing
sequence: (0-1s) DRAGON made of formulas ROARS fire, child behind fallen chair shield
(1-2s) Parent charges in with phone held forward, warrior stance
(2-3s) Phone screen expands into MIRROR SHIELD, reflects fire back
(3-4s) Fire reverses, dragon recoils, formulas breaking apart
(4-5s) Phone fires SOLUTION ARROWS at dragon's weak points
(5-6s) Dragon explodes into confetti of SOLVED equations
(6-7s) Equations drift down like snow, landing as perfect homework
(7-8s) Child emerges, picking up completed work, parent sheaths phone
scene_9.phone_action: Mirror shield and arrow weapon that defeats formula monsters
scene_9.core_message: Dragon attacks → Phone battles back → Formulas mastered

scene_10.title: Distraction Swarm
scene_10.description: Video game icons, social media symbols attacking like angry bees
sequence: (0-1s) SWARM of app icons buzzing around child's head, stinging, overwhelming
(1-2s) Parent JUMPS onto desk, phone overhead like weapon, focused eyes
(2-3s) Phone releases SONIC PULSE, ripple effect spreading outward
(3-4s) Icons FREEZE mid-air, caught in pulse wave, vibrating
(4-5s) Phone spins producing CONTAINMENT BUBBLE, trapping all icons
(5-6s) Bubble SHRINKS into phone screen, icons sucked away
(6-7s) Silence. Focus visibly returns to child's eyes, clarity restored
(7-8s) Child picks up pencil confidently, parent nods and lowers phone
scene_10.phone_action: Sonic pulse and containment that captures distractions
scene_10.core_message: Distraction attack → Phone contains it → Focus restored

scene_11.title: Labyrinth of Wrong Answers
scene_11.description: Child trapped in maze of wrong answer walls closing in
sequence: (0-1s) Child running through MAZE, RED X walls closing in from sides
(1-2s) Parent appears at maze entrance, raises phone high, concentrated
(2-3s) Phone fires GREEN LASER PATH through maze center
(3-4s) Laser burns correct path, wrong answer walls CRUMBLE to dust
(4-5s) Parent runs in, grabs child's hand, both sprint laser path
(5-6s) Path transforms wrong answers to GREEN CHECKMARKS as they run
(6-7s) They burst through maze exit together, EXPLOSION of success confetti
(7-8s) Standing victorious, maze gone, completed homework page glowing below
scene_11.phone_action: Laser pathfinder that reveals correct solutions through chaos
scene_11.core_message: Lost in mistakes → Phone shows way → Right path found

scene_12.title: Procrastination Chains
scene_12.description: Heavy chains labeled 'Later' binding child to chair, pulling them down
sequence: (0-1s) Child BOUND by chain, struggling, chair dragging toward screen abyss
(1-2s) Parent SMASHES through door, phone glowing white-hot in hand
(2-3s) Phone transforms into GLOWING BLADE, parent slashes air
(3-4s) Blade cuts through chains, SPARKS flying, metal links shattering
(4-5s) Each broken chain transforms into ENERGY BOOST flowing into child
(5-6s) Child LEAPS up, now energized, homework suddenly looks easy
(6-7s) Parent and child DOUBLE TAP screens together, sync gesture
(7-8s) Both working side-by-side, chains gone, momentum flowing
scene_12.phone_action: Energy blade that breaks chains and releases motivation
scene_12.core_message: Chained by delay → Phone breaks free → Energy unleashed
